column5: Hi all, Managed to get a half hour in for opener from my (destroyed) dock last night after work, lots of small males in 3'-4' FOW. Gonna drop a 12 foot boat in a small lake somewhere today, see how that goes.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ouV4clJWznE
Nice, thanks for posting. I swear I could sit there and do that all day long and never get bored!
lol, you sound like a kindred spirit. If I could just win the lottery I would sit there all day for sure!!
